Using [[Monzaemon]]'s [[White Secret Technique: The Chikamatsu Collection of Ten Puppets|puppets]], [[Chiyo]] uses the number four's cable arm and puppet number three's spinning chakra blade, and finishes with puppet number five's hidden head cables impaling the opponent.

[[pt-br:Técnica Branca Secreta: A Coleção de Dez Marionetes de Chikamatsu: Ataque da Terra]]
